item.title: qmk-animations
item.description: #QMK animation Having a keyboard with an oled screen means that you can add things to it. This cute little bongo cat animations or other things. This lets you create all sorts of animations https://githubmemory.com/repo/AskMeAboutBirds/qmk-oled-animation-compressor
